name: The Cryptic Crystals
description:
When a ruby and a sapphire emerge on a Homeworld colony, they soon learn that everything is not how it's suppose to be.

THIS IS A FAN GAME

I DO NOT OWN STEVEN UNIVERSE. JUST MY ORIGINAL CHARACTER THAT THIS GAME IS ABOUT

Big thank you to everyone who supported me while I was working on this, and a big thank you to everyone who let me put in their characters for the background or the story. Everyone is credited in the credits of the game and on my instagram, tigercookie102

Since this is my first serious game, I'm open to constructive criticism! I really want to improve my skills.

Thank you for checking out my game!
